sub_title: Creative Director, Designer, Musician, and Performer
summary: Ko-Yu (Sara) Huang is a Netherlands-based, Taiwan-born creative director, designer, musician, performer and co-founder of the cooking duo, Cook of ShadowS. Originally a singer-songwriter and a graphic designer since 2004 and 2010, Ko-Yu (Sara) dips her toe into an eclectic pool of inspiration (design, art, history, mythology, anthropology, performance, soundscape, and fash-ion) to knit a collection of interdisciplinary art about cultural encounters, personal and/or generational experience/trauma, and interpersonal communication. Design projects like ‘Daliyi: The Renovation of an Historical Town’ which won the Golden Award from the Education Bureau of Taichung City Government; several projects exhibited at the Cultural Heritage Park, Ministry of Culture in Taiwan. Also worked as a youth ambassador singer at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, R.O.C and a service designer at National Veterinary Hospital in Taiwan; and performed at improvisation music festivals in the Netherlands.
